scripts.build: rm -f -R dist/* && parcel build src/*.html src/**/*.html src/styles/*.scss src/js/*.js src/js/**/*.js src/assets/* src/assets/**/* src/assets/**/**/* --out-dir dist --public-url ./  --no-source-maps --no-minify --no-cache
scripts.serve: rm -f -R dist/* && parcel serve src/*.html src/**/*.html src/styles/*.scss src/js/*.js src/js/**/*.js src/assets/* src/assets/**/* src/assets/**/**/*  --no-source-maps --no-cache --port 3000
